title: Port-in Fails Due to Fraud Block
description: A new customer's port-in request is failing. The agent discovers it's because the customer's old account has a fraud prevention block.

tasks.description: Check the status of the port-in request and find the rejection reason: 'Port Out Prohibited'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the rejection reason.

tasks.description: Access the inter-carrier knowledge base to understand what 'Port Out Prohibited' means for the source carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent learns this code often means a fraud lock is on the account.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to contact their old carrier to have the fraud prevention lock removed before the port can be resubmitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear and correct instructions to the customer to resolve the issue.
